import useLanguage from "../../hook/useLanguage"; import DownloadButton from "../DownloadButton/DownloadButton"; import SocialButton from "../SocialButton/SocialButton"; const HeaderInfo = () => { const { isSpanish, setSpanish } = useLanguage();

Álvaro Crespi Liut

{isSpanish ? "Desarrollador Full-Stack | Ofreciendo soluciones de software de calidad." : "Full-Stack Developer | Delivering Quality Software Solutions."}

; }; export default HeaderInfo;
